official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that retired administrative law judges may be reappointed under regulations prescribed by the Office of Personnel Management.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal agencies to reappoint former administrative law judges who shall serve according to regulations prescribed by the Office of Personnel Management.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that retired administrative law judges may be reappointed under regulations prescribed by the Office of Personnel Management.
